name: buy(self, symbol, quantity, in_force, extended)

params.name: symbol
params.description: Symbol of the asset to buy

params.name: in_force
params.description: Duration the order is in force

params.name: extended
params.description: Whether to trade in extended hours or not

returns:
A dictionary with the following keys:
	- type: 'STOCK' or 'CRYPTO'
	- id: ID of order
	- symbol: symbol of asset
raises: Raises an exception if order fails.

name: sell(self, symbol, quantity, in_force, extended)

params.name: symbol
params.description: Symbol of the asset to sell

params.name: in_force
params.description: Duration the order is in force

params.name: extended
params.description: Whether to trade in extended hours or not

returns:
A dictionary with the following keys:
	- type: 'STOCK' or 'CRYPTO'
	- id: ID of order
	- symbol: symbol of asset
raises: Raises an exception if order fails.
